title: WEHI-SODA-Hub/spatialvpt pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

algorithm_json.errorMessage: Algorithm file with .json extension must be provided and must exist

images_dir.errorMessage: Images folder must be provided and must exist

um_to_mosaic_file.errorMessage: Mosaic pixel transformation matrix file file with .csv extension must be provided and must exist

detected_transcripts.errorMessage: Detected transcripts file with .csv extension must be provided and must exist

input_vzg.errorMessage: Input VZG file with .vzg extension must be provided and must exist

metadata.errorMessage: Input metadata file with .csv extension must be provided and must exist

entity_by_gene.errorMessage: Input entity-by-gene file with .csv extension must be provided and must exist

boundaries.errorMessage: Input boundaries file with .parquet extension must be provided and must exist

combine_channel_settings.errorMessage: Combine channel settings must be in the format 'channel1+channel2+channel3=merged_channel_name:z1:t512:m0.108' where z, t and m values are the z-index, tile size and microns per pixel
